alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 3:59AM CDT until May 07 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Greeley County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Valley County in central Nebraska... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 359 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Hartsuff State Park, or 8 miles north of Ord, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Greeley and northeastern Valley Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
